name: BatteryElectrodeActiveMaterialMetadata
description: A description of lithium ion battery active material metadata

properties.name: conventional_name
properties.description: Conventional name of the active material. Valid entries are: LCO, LFP, LNMO, LMO, NMC, Graphite, Silicon, LTO, other, or unknown

properties.name: molecular_weight
properties.description: Conventional name of the active material. Valid entries are: LCO, LFP, LNMO, LMO, NMC, Graphite, Silicon, LTO, other, or unknown

properties.name: specific_capacity
properties.description: Specific electric charge capacity of the material.
